body.content: The Minnesota Twins traded 22-year-old minor league starting pitcher Chris Thomas to the Boston Red Sox, getting 19-year-old minor league center fielder Jos?Pantoia in return.
Arizona Diamondbacks: Placed SP Ethan Hankins on the 60-day disabled list.
